Cloud Playout Channel Details

This page shows you analytics for a running channel, and allows you to edit the program.
View Analytics
  1. View the currently playing video and analytics.
  2. The analytics graphs are useful for seeing problems, especially with live feeds not connecting (dips in input data).
  • Learn more
View in Brightcove Live
  1. Click View in Brightcove Live.
  2. In Brightcove Live, you will see additional options such as getting the publishing code for the event.
  • Learn more
Show Playing Now
  1. Click Show Playing Now to highlight the currently playing video.
  • Learn more
Edit Program
  1. Click Edit Program.
  2. Add, delete, or re-order videos. (Reorder by clicking and dragging the :: icon.)
  3. Click Save.

Changes will apply to future playing items.

  • Learn more
Add Static Overlay
  1. Click Overlays.
  2. Click Static:
  3. Click Add New.
  4. Select a layer (only matters if you're adding two overlays that will overlap - 1 means on top).
  5. For the overlay image, you have already defined one, you can select it from the dropdown, or otherwise select Add New Image.
  6. If this is a new overlay, enter a public URL where the image resides in the Image URL field.
  • Learn more
Add Dynamic Overlay
  1. Click Overlays.
  2. Click Static:
  3. Click Add New.
  4. Select a layer (only matters if you're adding two overlays that will overlap - 1 means on top).
  5. For the overlay image, you have already defined one, you can select it from the dropdown, or otherwise select Add New Image.
  6. If this is a new overlay, enter a public URL where the image resides in the Image URL field.
  • Learn more
